comments: This contract includes one or more amendments. This contract was competitively sourced. This contract is a multi-year contract. This is a notice of the restatement of Contract EN57830152 dated 2012-10-15/2013-03-31. The contract was misstated for original contract value, $454,299.53, and contract end date, 2013-06-30, which omitted the option, and has been corrected.
